title: WHY IS RIOT SUCH A SHIT COMPANY!
body: Stupid bugs, countless number of summoners bitching, COUNTLESS summoners being banned for being "toxic". Since when was saying youre shit to someone toxic? god damn thsi game is filled with little bitches. RIOT FIX THE BUGS. RIOT STOP BANNING FOR TOXICITY SUCH FUCKING BULLSHIT, BEING TOXIC BY SAYING KYS? ARE YOU FUCKING KIDDING ME? why is it bannable when all they got to do is fucking mute me. god damn riot is a baby back BITCH company.****
